name: One Point of Contact
description:
Story:

You are a space delivery man making a routine delivery through what you though was a safe zone. But just your luck you’ve stumbled into a mine field and now the mines are trying to take you and your cargo out. Your ship has no weapons but luckily it has a super reinforced nose piece designed for just this type of situation.

Instructions:

  1. Move your ship using the WASD or Arrow keys
  2. Rotate your ship using the mouse
  3. Blow mines up by touching them with the Yellow Tip of your ship to earn points
  4. Don’t let the mines touch your ships body or cargo otherwise its game over.
